mapper.select: select u.user_name,u.user_email,u.sns_email from tbl_experience_notice e join tbl_company c on e.company_id = c.user_id join tbl_follow f on c.user_id = f.company_id join tbl_member_alarm_setting a on f.member_id = a.member_id join tbl_user u on a.member_id = u.id where e.id=${id} and a.company_experience_notice_alarm = 'active'and u.user_status='active'

select u.user_name,u.user_email,u.sns_email from tbl_intern_notice i join tbl_company c on i.company_id = c.user_id join tbl_follow f on c.user_id = f.company_id join tbl_member_alarm_setting a on f.member_id = a.member_id join tbl_user u on a.member_id = u.id where i.id=${id} and a.company_intern_notice_alarm = 'active'and u.user_status='active'
